{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06690v1", "title": "Homogenization theory of random walks in degenerate random environment", "summary": "Recent progress on the understanding of the Random Conductance Model is
reviewed. A particular emphasis is on homogenization results such as functional
central limit theorems, local limit theorems and heat kernel estimates for
almost every realization of the environment, established for random walks among
stationary ergodic conductances that are possibly unbounded but satisfy certain
moment conditions.", "main_category": "math.PR", "categories": "math.PR", "published": "2025-04-09T08:52:16Z"}
